Neural Machine Translation

This document discusses building an English-to-Portuguese neural machine translation model using Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) networks with attention. The goal is to improve machine translation for short to medium length sentences and enable word sense disambiguation.

Key Concepts:

  • Machine translation
  • Word sense disambiguation
  • Encoder-decoder system
  • Attention mechanism
  • Minimum Bayes Risk decoding
  • Encoder class
  • Bidirectional LSTM
  • Mask Zero parameter
  • Functional API
  • Sequence-to-Sequence Model
